text: Andrea González Náder (born 1 April 1987) is an Ecuadorian environmental activist, businesswoman and politician. She is running for President of Ecuador in the 2025 general election. She ran for vice-president in the 2023 Ecuadorian election as Fernando Villavicencio's running mate. She was born in Guayaquil, Ecuador. In June 2024, González Náder registered as a pre-candidate for President of Ecuador in the upcoming 2025 general election. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian activists Category:Businesspeople from Guayaquil Category:Politicians from Guayaquil Category:Environmentalists
title: Andrea González Náder
